plot: While villain Grizzle plots against the Care Bears, it is up to Oopsy Bear to come to their rescue.
title: Care Bears: Oopsy Does It!
plot_es: While villain Grizzle plots against the Care Bears, it is up to Oopsy Bear to come to their rescue.
plot_en: While villain Grizzle plots against the Care Bears, it is up to Oopsy Bear to come to their rescue.
